meanings.definition: A council or assembly of church officials
meanings.sent1: The consistories gathered to discuss important matters within the church.
meanings.sent2: The local church's consistories meet every month to plan events.
meanings.sent3: The consistories decided to have a potluck to make their meetings more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: In the world of church politics, the consistories are the decision-makers.
meanings.sent5: The consistories, like a team of wise advisors, guide the church's direction.

meanings.definition: The place where such a council meets
meanings.sent1: The old library was transformed into the consistories for the church meetings.
meanings.sent2: The consistories were decorated with religious paintings and symbols.
meanings.sent3: The consistories had comfortable chairs for the church officials to sit during meetings.
meanings.sent4: The consistories echoed with the voices of the council members during discussions.
meanings.sent5: The consistories exuded a sense of solemnity and reverence during the gatherings.

meanings.definition: The group of cardinals in charge of electing the pope
meanings.sent1: The consistories were responsible for selecting the new pope.
meanings.sent2: The cardinals gathered in the consistories to begin the papal election process.
meanings.sent3: The consistories were abuzz with anticipation as the cardinals prepared to vote.
meanings.sent4: The decision made in the consistories would shape the future of the church.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere in the consistories was tense as the cardinals debated the candidates.
